Hey Dave and Mike,

This email is in response to the clarifying questions you asked:

1.) CardSecure can wrap a CardPointe token (AKA: there can be a "double token")
2.) Shift4 will need to ask for both a CardSecure and a CardPointe token ID in their submission to CardConnect

    if a double loken is being used
3.) At this time, there is not a way for a CardPointe token to be wrapped by a CardSecure token

Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.

Thanks,

Rick

This email is in response to the clarifying questions you asked:

1.) CardSecure can wrap a CardPointe token (AKA: there can be a "double token")
2.) Shift4 will need to ask for both a CardSecure and a CardPointe token ID in their submission to CardConnect

    if a double loken is being used
3.) At this time, there is not a way for a CardPointe token to be wrapped by a CardSecure token

Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.
